snippet: “Anyone who spends a day in Israel knows that the Israeli press does not pull any punches when it comes to the prime minister,” his spokesman writes....
lead_paragraph: “Anyone who spends a day in Israel knows that the Israeli press does not pull any punches when it comes to the prime minister,” his spokesman writes.

headline.print_headline: Netanyahu’s Spokesman, on Press Freedom in Israel
headline.main: Benjamin Netanyahu’s Spokesman, on Press Freedom in Israel
